home.title: SAVE WITH CROSS BORDER SHIPPING FROM CANADA TO THE UNITED STATES
home.description: At CrossBorder Shipments, we specialize in providing cost-effective shipping services for businesses shipping from Montreal, Laval, and the South Shore to locations across the United States.

about.title: Learn More About Our Expertise
about.description: Expert cross-border logistics provider, dedicated to bridging the gap between local products and the US market with seamless, reliable shipping solutions.

security.title: Our Services Include
security.description: - Use of U.S. address for cheaper freight rates - Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored for online sellers and various businesses - Bulk shipment transportation

services.title: Why Choose CrossBorder Shipments?
services.descOff1: We come to you, pick up your shipments, and transport them across the border, drastically cutting your shipping expenses.
services.descOff2: We cater to Amazon and eBay sellers, e-commerce stores, and food businesses, adapting our services to meet the unique needs of each sector.
services.descOff3: Our streamlined process not only saves you money but also simplifies your operations.
services.descOff4: With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, CrossBorder Shipments is your trusted partner for expanding your business across the border.
services.descOff5: Our dedicated support team is here to assist you at every step of your shipping process.

contact.title: Reach Out to Us
contact.description: For inquiries or support, contact us via email, phone, or visit our headquarters. We're here to help.
